What are the treatments for X-linked dominant scapuloperoneal myopathy ?,How might scapuloperoneal myopathy be treated? There is no standard course of treatment for scapuloperoneal myopathy. Some patients may benefit from physical therapy or other therapeutic exercises.,GARD,X-linked dominant scapuloperoneal myopathy
